name: Iberostar Grand Hotel Salome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just spent a wonderful 13 nights at this small, intimate 23 room, adult only hotel. From the moment we arrived, greeted with a glass of cava at their personal check-in, until we left having been moved to another room so we had somewhere to change and shower before our late flight home, it's been very relaxing and enjoyable. We have nothing but praise for Kim, Debbie, Jessica and Gilda for whom nothing was too much trouble. Also the same could be said for Montoya and the staff at the pool bar and restaurants. It's the personal service and the little extra touches which makes this one of the best hotels we've stayed in. We were on an all inclusive basis. We've eaten in their two wonderful restaurants. We particularly liked Posieden which was quiet and elegant with excellent food and service. Portofino was very good too but more casual. We did eat one evening in the buffet restaurant but didn't enjoy the atmosphere. We are not buffet people! Do have a 'gourmet breakfast' on your terrace one morning. It is fantastic. There is a wonderful Zen Spa where I had an amazing massage and my husband thought the gym facilities there were very good too. We will certainly be returning to this hotel in 2014. Thank you to everyone for a very memorable and relaxing holiday.
reviews.title: Excellent holiday - we will return

reviews.text: A very good value for money; a variety of food is greater than in many other 5-star hotels; great care for details (gardening and current refurbishments).
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice tennis court, with surface suitable for more senior players (not too hard for your legs).
reviews.title: Another fantastic visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you to the team that is Salome, always there to please, nothing is to much trouble. The rooms are immaculate, Ruth on the Terrace for breakfast always has a smile, Montoya for lunch, those coffees he makes with liqueur 43 are brilliant. Dinner is such a pleasure to look forward too, so much choice. Kim and her team of butlers are always there to greet you in the morning and discuss your day. The Margarita's in the bar, such a treat. This hotel has all we want from a holiday, See you soon.
reviews.title: 5 Star Luxury

reviews.text: This was our first visit to this lovely hotel. Read all the previous reviews and decided to give it a try. From arrival you are made to feel very welcome and the staff are very friendly and eager to please. The suites are lovely and the cleaners keep them immaculate. The pool area is great, plenty of sun beds with lovely thick cushions and you help yourself to towels throughout the day. Some of the tiles on the pool terrace could do with a bit of attention but that is being picky. The pool is kept
reviews.title: Paradise in Tenerife

aka: Iberostar Grand Hotel Salome Tenerife/Playa De Fanabe
description: Part of the Anthelia hotel complex, the Grand Hotel Salomé is a member of the Iberostar chain’s exclusive group of hotels known as the “Grand Collection.” This all-inclusive resort, magnificently located between the beaches of Playa del Duque and Playa de Fañabe in the coveted area of Costa Adeje, Tenerife, on the Canary Islands of Spain, is an adults-only oasis offering the highest levels of comfort, attention to detail, and quality in its facilities, services, dining, and leisure.
